sources.title: 24 Seven | FULL MOVIE | Action, Danny Trejo
sources.description:
Jairo Torres (Danny Trejo) is accused of burglary by his financial advisor (Eddy Salazar) who has become an insomniac in the midst of a market crash.

Danny Trejo, John Heard, Clare Grant, Eddy Salazar, Alimi Ballard, Spencer Berger, Keith Szarabajka

Directed by Monty Miranda
2013

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: After someone breaks into John Figg's home and takes all of his material and sentimental possessions, he develops a severe case of insomnia and learns that the people around him are not as trustworthy as they appear to be.
metadata.Writer: Eddy Salazar, Monty Miranda, Peter Kenneth Jones
metadata.Actors: Eddy Salazar, Clare Grant, Danny Trejo
